section.title: Blue Variables
section.para: blue treats special text as special blue variables. Below is a list of those variables.

row.entry: Duration of the generated score from the timeline (Available in Global SCO text area.)
Replaces with instrumentId; if the instrument is a named instrument, value is quoted. Generally used when creating notes.(Available within instruments and some SoundObjects.)

Replaces with instrumentId; if the instrument is a named instrument, the value is not quoted. Generally used when working with ORC code to give a variable a unique ID, i.e. "gk_var<INSTR_NAME>".(Available within instruments and some SoundObjects.)
The start time of rendering. Does not take into account time warping of score. (Available in Global SCO text area.)
The start time of rendering. Takes into account time warping of score. (Available in Global SCO text area.)
The time value when always-on effects instruments need to start. Calculated as the time value of the first soundObject that is not a FrozenSoundObject or Comment. (Available in Global SCO text area.)
